staffthoughts.GiveTreat: I better give %s a treat so they will keep doing that trick right.
staffthoughts.ConductShow: I hope the crowd enjoys this show.
staffthoughts.FailureReaction: Oh no! %s messed up that trick!
staffthoughts.SuccessReaction: %s did a great job on that trick.
staffthoughts.CriticalReaction: Wow! %s did a really good job on that trick!
staffthoughts.WaitShow: I bet the next show will be even better!
staffthoughts.PreShow: I better clean up for the next show.
staffthoughts.PostShow: Boy, that show left a bit of a mess.
staffthoughts.Training: Before too long, %s will totally know this trick.
